President Obama claimed in September that Yemen was a U.S. counterterrorism success, and that the fight against the Islamic State (ISIS, ISIL, IS) terror group would be modeled after efforts in Yemen and Somalia.

The President stated:

This counterterrorism campaign will be waged through a steady, relentless effort to take out ISIL wherever they exist, using our air power and our support for partner forces on the ground.
